subject: Configurations/control box sparking
description_text:
Hi, i have powered the control box with the dc power for haptics, and its
sparked a bit. I read it needs some type of grounding wire. Do these come
with grounding wire? Im also going to assume that control box will cause
issues with other faulty configurations.
Without haptics/power plugged in, it all works fine. And technically it
does work now, i just cant configure any other controllers or anything
because its reading something in the control box/pedals as an input.

conversations.body_text: Hi，David Yang，  Sparks appearing are normal — this is caused by the three small capacitors on the main controller board (responsible for the motors) charging up. It will not damage the board, and using 24V is completely safe. Regarding the “cannot configure and set” issue you mentioned, could you clarify what exactly happens? Please provide a screenshot or a video for us to review (videos can be shared via Google Drive). In most cases, this is simply a configuration issue.
